name: Bond Repair Custom Conditioner Mask for Wavy, Damaged Hair
about: What it is: A customizable conditioner mask that adds body, flexibility, and shine to wavy, damaged hair. Enhance your conditioner mask even further with Lift Legend, Moisture Shot and Shine Queen Hair Goal Concentrates. Our PRO line is our most concentrated collection to date and specifically targets damaged hair. This Adaptive Bonding Complex repairs mechanical, chemical, and heat damage, thus promoting stronger, more resilient hair over time...Hair Texture: Wavy..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Color Safe.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Dryness..Key Benefits:.- Moisturizes waves without weight.- Re-links broken bonds, strengthens hair.- Promotes softness and manageability..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Adaptive f3 Bonding Complex (TM/MC): Technology that directly targets damage on each hair strand to rebuild bonds and reduce breakage..- Lysine from Rice Amino Acids and Manketti Seed Oil: Adds body, flexibility, and shine...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Function of Beautyu2019s most concentrated formula to date, this custom haircare is powered by a patented Adaptive f3 Bonding Complex that self-adjusts and targets your unique damage and re-builds bonds for stronger, more resilient hair. To customize your formula and address your hair concerns even further, choose up to three Hair Goal Concentrates per product...Fragrance Description: A bouquet of fresh spring flowers, with notes of pink peony, wild freesia, and creamy sandalwood. Dermatologist tested and suitable for all skin types. Fragrance is microbiome friendly and gentle on scalp...Clinical Results: 2x smoother hair with 2x less breakage, for stronger, more resilient hair after just five washes..
ingredients: -Adaptive f3 Bonding Complex (TM/MC): Technology that directly targets damage on each hair strand to rebuild bonds and reduce breakage..-Lysine from Rice Amino Acids and Manketti Seed Oil: Adds body, flexibility, and shine...Water (Aqua), Cetyl Esters, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Arachidyl/Behenyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane (Hemisqualane), Fragrance (Parfum),  Rice Amino Acids, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Schinziophyton Rautanenii (Manketti) Kernel Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica (Chia) Seed Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Cicer Seed Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Arginine, Itaconic Acid, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate, Tocopherol, Arachidyl/Behenyl Betainate Esylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-37, Amodimethicone, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PEG-100 Stearate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Distearate, Glyceryl Monostearate, Disodium EDTA, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Propanediol, Citric Acid, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Sorbitan Oleate, Caprylic Acid, Xylitol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool....
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Add up to three Hair Goal Concentrates into your Conditioner Mask (Hair Goal Concentrates sold separately)..-Add one Hair Goal Concentrate at a time and stir well before first use. .-After shampooing, apply Conditioner Mask to wet hair, mid-lengths to ends..-Leave on for two to five minutes to use as a conditioner. .-Leave on up to 10 minutes for a more intense conditioning treatment..-Rinse thoroughly..-Style hair as usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently incorporated the NEW Wavy Hair Recovery Conditioner Mask into my hair care routine, and let me tell you, itu2019s a game-changer! As someone with wavy hair prone to dryness and frizz, finding the right conditioner that provides deep hydration without weighing down my waves has always been a challenge. But this conditioner mask has truly exceeded my expectations. Firstly, the scent is divine u2013 itu2019s refreshing and not overwhelming, which is perfect for me. The texture of the mask is rich and creamy, and a small amount goes a long way, making it incredibly economical. After using this conditioner mask just a few times, I noticed a remarkable difference in the softness and manageability of my hair. My waves felt deeply nourished and moisturized, with significantly reduced frizz u2013 something Iu2019ve struggled with for years. What sets this conditioner mask apart is its ability to deeply hydrate my hair without weighing it down. It provides intense moisture and hydration, leaving my waves feeling silky smooth and looking incredibly shiny. I also appreciate that this conditioner mask is free from sulfates and parabens, making it gentle on my hair and scalp. Plus, itu2019s enriched with natural ingredients like argan oil and shea butter, which help to nourish and repair damaged hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard a lot of great things about Function of Beauty, so when I saw this custom recovery conditioner for wavy hair, I was extremely excited to try it. I have thick, wavy, and bleached hair. This means I also experience a lot of dryness and damage of my hair. I wanted to try this conditioner to see if it would work to help with my damaged hair. Let me tell youu2026this conditioner does not disappoint! First, the smell of this conditioner is absolutely amazing! The smell lingers throughout the day, which I LOVE, but it is also not overpowering. A little definitely goes a long way, which is great. I can apply a little of the conditioner and it works well on my thick hair, which is great because it will last a while. It says to apply this conditioner for 2-5 minutes for regular conditioner and up to 10 minutes for a more intense conditioning treatment. I usually leave it on for the 10 minutes. I LOVE how it makes my hair feel. I have noticed when I use this conditioner that my hair feels smoother and more manageable. This custom recovery conditioner also helps with frizz and helps to detangle my hair. I have definitely noticed a difference in the health of my hair since I started using this conditioner. If you are looking for a new conditioner that will help with damaged and wavy hair, I highly recommend this Custom Recovery Conditioner Mask for wavy hair by Function Of Beauty!

My hair feels silkier and smoother to the touch, making me want to run my fingers through it all day. It's like a luxurious spa treatment for my hair right at home. My wavy hair tends to get tangled but since incorporating this product into my routine, I've noticed a significant improvement. Function of Beauty's Pro Custom Recovery Conditioner Mask is truly a gem for anyone with wavy hair. It delivers on its promises of increased volume, shine, softness, and manageability. reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try Function of Beauty for a bit now. Function of Beauty gifted me their new Pro Wavy Hair Recovery Shampoo and Conditioner Mask, along with three mix-in concentrates complimentary for my honest review. ud83dudc69u200dud83euddb3  I really enjoy customizable haircare so when given the opportunity to try this line and brand I had to take it. I have wavy, thick, coarse, dry, frizzy, color treated hair and look for products that can help my hair. Function of Beauty Pro sent me their Custom Recovery Shampoo for Wavy Hair, Custom Recovery Conditioner Mask for Wavy Hair, Anti Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate Mix-In (The Frizz Genius), Shine Enhancing Hair Gloss Goal Concentrate (The Shine Queen) and the Volume Hair Goal Concentrate Mix-In (The Lift Legend). The packaging was cute and I loved that the mix-ins were the shape of the Function Beauty F, making them even cuter! ud83dudc69u200dud83euddb3  The mix-ins can be added to either the shampoo, conditioner mask, or both. I really wish this had come with 2 of each mix-in as after reading the first steps and adding them to the shampoo, I realized they could be added to the conditioner mask as well. I personally would prefer my mix-ins to be in the conditioning mask as I feel they would be better absorbed that way, as I leave conditioning masks on longer. ud83dudc69u200dud83euddb3  My favorite was definitely the conditioning mask as it really helped add shine, volume and smoothness to my hair. My hair is starting to feel stronger and it smelling amazing! I love that it contains scent notes of pink peony, wild freesia, and creamy sandalwood. My hair now smells, looks and feels wonderful! ud83dudc69u200dud83euddb3

reviews.review_text: My hair has always been super dry and frizzy, and I now have my hair looking and feeling brand new! This duo has completely changed my hair overnight, and the frizz is no longer an issue! I customized my shampoo with the anti-frizz concentrate, and used the shine boosting serum for my mask. My hair is so soft and shiny! This duo has been an absolute game changer, and I am loving everything about it! Gifted by function of beauty
